item.title: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Where to Find All Klownspiracy Room Tapes
item.description:
Klownspiracy Room Tapes in Killer Klowns From Outer Space act as lore collectibles similar to those in other horror games like Dead by Daylight and Friday The 13th . These tapes are narrated and give insight into the activities of the Klowns in various places and times on Earth.

There are 39 tapes for you to find, but the game doesn't explain precisely how, where, or when you can find them. In addition, it doesn't say whether you can collect them when playing as a Klown or Human. Here's where to find all Klownspiracy Room tapes in Killer Klowns From Outer Space to unlock lore about the Klowns. It will answer plenty of your burning questions, like where their Cotton Candy Guns came from.

Klownspiracy Room Tape Locations

The only way to find Klownspiracy Room Tapes in Killer Klowns From Outer Space is by opening the Loot Containers found on the maps of Crescent Cove. However, the game randomizes which Loot Containers they are in (and the locations of the Loot Containers themselves). This gives you an incentive to open every Loot Container you come across to find them all. Once found, the game will add these tapes to your Klownspiracy Room collection. Head there, and you can listen to several thirty-second narrations that tell the story of the Klowns in greater detail.

Listening To The Klownspiracy Tapes

Here's how to access the Klownspiracy Room in Killer Klowns From Outer Space:

  1. Navigate to the Main Menu.
  2. Select the Extras option.
  3. Pick the Klownspiracy Room option.

Prepare for an exhilarating journey as you delve into the three sections of Klownspiracy Room tapes waiting to be discovered. Each section, divided into 13 chapters, unveils the intriguing history of the enigmatic Klowns on Earth. The three Klownspiracy Room Tape categories are:

  • Wesker Newton : He is not a character from the movie, but is used to give deeper detail about the Klowns through the tapes from before the events of the Killer Klowns From Outer Space movie.
  • Terenzi: Get ready for a captivating narrative. The renowned Terenzi brothers will personally narrate each tape, sharing their thrilling experiences with the Klowns in Crescent Cove, like when they performed Klowntalities during the movie.
  • Vegas 90: Listeners are transported back to Las Vegas in the '90s as a teenager calls the Vegas police to report seeing an alien spaceship heading towards the Hoover Dam. 1990 is two years after the movie's events, which gives insight into what they were doing after the film's protagonists stopped them.

Regrettably, the Klownspiracy Room tapes can only be unearthed by human players in Killer Klowns From Outer Space since they are the only ones that can open Loot Containers. This gameplay restriction, rooted in the game's lore, ensures that the Klowns' secrets remain hidden from the masses, adding a layer of intrigue and realism.

item.title: Stellar Blade: 7 Best Gear, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Perfect Combat Gear enhances EVE's striking power at high HP, making it ideal for skilled players.
  • Training Gear helps players earn extra SP for unlocking skills, crucial for end-game content.
  • Combo Attack Enhancement Gear boosts attack power for breaking enemy shields with ease.

Progressing in Stellar Blade can be challenging, especially if players do not pay close attention to EVE's gear and Exospine. While it is not a soulslike, it can be difficult for people who don't have too much experience with action games. However, the developers have included different items to make things easier.

There is a variety of gear in Stellar Blade, and each one has its own purpose. Players can equip up to four different types of gear, but it is important to choose the correct ones. By selecting the appropriate gear for EVE, players can enhance her attacks, earn more SP and gold, and heal quickly. With that in mind, here is the best gear in Stellar Blade .

7 Perfect Combat Gear

Increases Attack Power At High HP

The Perfect Combat Gear is arguably the best choice for those who can keep EVE's HP high while fighting enemies. This can be done by dodging attacks and parrying any incoming strikes. Once players get a good grasp of the two mechanics, they should be able to maintain EVE's HP effortlessly.

With the Perfect Combat Gear, EVE's attacks will pack a stronger punch. If her HP is high enough, her striking power will increase significantly. Like all the gear in Stellar Blade, using the three-star variant offers the best results.

6 Training Gear

Earn Extra SP

There are a total of five different skill trees in Stellar Blade, which means players have the freedom to pick the ones that they find most useful. Some of the unlockable abilities in the game are pretty cheap and only cost one or two SP. However, the ones needed for end-game content cost four and even five SP.

Unlocking these skills means that players will run out of SP in next to no time. This is where the Training gear comes in. By equipping EVE with this gear, players will be able to earn more SP. Since there is a trophy associated with unlocking all the skills, the Training Gear is a blessing for those looking to earn the platinum trophy.

5 Combo Attack Enhancement Gear

Increases Power Of Combo Attack

Most enemies in Stellar Blade have sturdy shields and high HP, so players will have to use multiple attacks to take them down. The Combo Attack Enhancement is an exceptional piece of equipment that increases the attack power when the combo strikes are level 2 or higher.

When equipped alongside other gear that enhances EVE's attack power, players will be able to break enemy shields with little to no difficulty.

4 Combat Supply Gear

Heal By Defeating Naytibas

Stellar Blade provides players with different options to heal EVE. The most common one is using the tumbler, which is recharged every time players rest at a camp. Early in the game, players will have access to a limited number of tumblers, which can be problematic. As they continue to progress, they will find the materials needed to upgrade the tumbler, increasing its overall charges.

But sometimes even multiple tumblers might not be enough. To solve this problem, players can equip the Combat Supply Gear. This gear restores EVE's HP by a certain amount whenever she defeats an enemy. The Combat Supply Gear is a great choice, especially when players explore the open world.

3 Double Edged Gear

More Damage

The Double Edged Gear is recommended for those who have nearly mastered the art of dodging and parrying attacks. By avoiding any incoming attacks, players will be able to make full use of this gear, as it enhances the attack power but also increases the damage taken.

For a 20% improvement in the damage output, EVE will take 30% more damage from enemy hits. It is a high-risk, high-reward gear, so players should equip it only when they get the hang of all the mechanics in the game. It is advised to use the Double Edged Gear in conjunction with the Protection Gear or Shield Enhancement gear to make things a bit easier.

2 Speed Increase Gear

Improved Attack Speed

The Speed Increase Gear enhances EVE's attack speed. At first glance, it may seem underwhelming, but frankly, it is one of the best gears in Stellar Blade. Depending on the rarity of the gear, EVE's attack speed can be improved from anywhere between 10-15%.

With a higher attack speed, players can string up combos in a shorter time, which in turn will help them beat enemies quickly. It is a real lifesaver, especially when players are confronted by a horde of enemies.

1 Beta Enhancement Gear

Increases Damage Dealt By Beta Skills

Beta Skills are not available in the early stages of the game as they are incredibly powerful, so when players unlock Beta Skills, taking down enemies becomes much easier. Beta Skills can be charged by perfect partying, which can be difficult for some gamers. But considering how powerful these abilities are, it makes sense. Another way to recharge the gauge is by landing attacks on the enemies.

With the Beta Enhancement Gear, players can increase the damage that they can deal with Beta Skills. There are three different rarities, so it is recommended to use the three-star variant, as it enhances the damage significantly.

item.title: Lords Of The Fallen: Best Catalysts, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Nohuta Effigy offers high damaging spells early on, perfect for players seeking quick victories from afar.
  • Radiant Purifier Catalyst allows for a damage-focused Radiance build with high spellpower for flexibility.
  • Miranda's Touch provides high spellpower for multiple powerful spells, making it ideal for taking down enemies.

Lords of the Fallen has three different magic schools in the game that a player can choose from and dedicate their entire playthrough to. Performing these different kinds of magic, however, does require the use of a Catalyst . Every school has different catalysts that scale with Radiance and Inferno .

There are a lot of catalysts scattered throughout the game, either stashed behind boxes or given as a reward for completing certain questlines. These are some of the best catalysts players can use and where they might find them.

Updated June 2, 2024 by Waseem Muhammad: Lords of the Fallen has seen multiple updates in the past year after a not-so-exciting launch. The reason for these updates by the developers is to fix the initial bugs and also add more content to the game for the community. While fans are eagerly waiting for a possible DLC, they are still able to try out the new weapons and questlines the game has added.

The Catalysts in the game have not seen a major change throughout the updates and the ones on top are still the best options. This update lists stat information and requirements of all the Catalysts.

6 Nohuta Effigy

Allows For High Damaging Spells From Early Game

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

1.3

3

16 Radiance and 16 Inferno

D+ Radiance and D+ Inferno

Nohuta Effigy is most probably the first option for many players who do not want to spend a lot of Vigor upgrading Radiance as well as Inferno to buff up the scaling of the spells. Having the highest Spellpower out of all the Umbral catalysts, Nohuta Effigy allows the player to take those low-damaging Umbral spells and increase their damage output by miles.

It can be acquired early in Revelation Depth making the rest of the playthrough a walk in the park. Through the early stages of the game, the players can solely focus on taking out enemies quicker from afar because of this catalyst's use.

Where To Acquire Catalyst

From the Skinstealer boss head down towards the small passageway on the left and keep going forward. Head left twice but not through the door and a dead end will appear. Change into Umbral and Soulflay the Umbral Belly to acquire this catalyst.

5 Radiant Purifier Catalyst

Damage-Focused Radiance Build Tuned With High Spellpower

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

0.8

3

15 Radiance

C+ Radiance

Choosing between higher Spellpower or higher scaling can be a difficult thing. However, in the early levels when players do not have many points in Radiance or Inferno, catalysts such as Radiant Purifier Catalyst can make a difference. The catalyst can be acquired very early on in Tower of Pennance , depending on the route the player takes for their playthrough.

Having such a high Spellpower catalyst allows for a flexible build. The drawback of having three slots can be noticeable but not to all players, especially those ignoring the Radiance buff spells.

Where To Acquire Catalyst

The catalyst is at the bottom of the Tower of Pennance just before the boss fight on the left. Near the elevator, pick up the item lying on the shrine with lit candles on it.

4 Miranda's Touch

Lower Slots In Exchange For High Spellpower

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

1.1

3

15 Inferno

C+ Inferno

The catalyst being available after defeating the last boss in the game can be a letdown for some players. However, this does not change the fact that Miranda's Touch takes the Spellpower to the ceiling. The catalyst has only three slots, making Miner's Pendant an option for players who want to add another slot.

Multiple spells can benefit a lot from the high Spellpower this catalyst provides such as Seismic Slam and Severing Blades . These spells are good options in PvP as well if the player is not used to dodging them, allowing the player to deal massive damage with the extra Spellpower.

Where To Acquire Catalyst

This catalyst can be acquired after completing Damarose 's Questline. Defeat The Sundered Monarch and head up to find the items lying on the ground before interacting with Adyr .

3 Lost Berescu's Catalyst

Allows A Hybrid Build Of Different Magic With the Highest Scaling

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

1.8

5

20 Radiance and 20 Inferno

A Radiance and A Inferno

For players who have acquired a lot of Vigor and have upgraded their Radiance and Inferno stats up to level 40 must have this catalyst equipped if they want to continue using any type of magic. This is because as the catalyst takes both stats into account and has "A" scaling on max level this allows the players to make a hybrid build if they want.

There are rings in the game that allow the player to use the magic of a different school, allowing players to cast protection magic as well as ranged Umbral or Infernal spells at high damage, annihilating mobs of enemies.

Where To Acquire Catalyst

From the Vestige of Lost Berescu go up the multiple sets of ladders and head through the archway near the Holy Bulwark enemy near the bridge. Behind the archway change into Umbral and Soulflay the nearby Umbral Belly to acquire this catalyst.

2 Exacter Scripture

High Radiance Scaling Along With Five Slots

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

0.9

5

25 Radiance

S Radiance

Exacter Scripture earns the second spot because of how versatile the catalyst is. It provides five options of Radiance spells that the player can take into the world of Lords of the Fallen . There are a ton of Radiance spells that are quite overpowered and having the Exacter Scripture can make them even more powerful because of the high scaling.

On the max level, the scaling of Radiance reaches "S" making spells like Lucent Beam and Orius' Judgement melt the bosses' health bar. Players can easily acquire this catalyst early on in Sunless Skein .

Where To Acquire Catalyst

To acquire this catalyst the players must complete Exacter Dunmire 's quest. Simply head to the Vestige of Hooded Antuli after talking with Exacter Dunmire in Mother's Lull . From the Vestige head through the tunnel that leads back to the Upper Calrath and the items should be on the ground along the way.

1 Queen Sophesia's Catalyst

High Inferno Scaling Along With Five Slots

Weight

Spell Slots

Requirements

Scaling (Max Level)

0.8

5

25 Inferno

S Inferno

Queen Sophesia's Catalyst is the best catalyst for Infernal spells for multiple reasons. Having five slots without having to equip the Miner's Pendant can be extremely useful, especially when the player wants to equip damaging as well as buff spells. The catalyst has the highest scaling out of all the other Inferno catalysts reaching "S" when fully maxed out.

The catalyst is acquired later on after Tortured Prisoner's questline so it might not be the first pick for all players. However, having this option for the subsequent playthroughs is a must.

Where To Acquire Catalyst

This catalyst can be acquired after finishing the Tortured Prisoner 's questline. Alternatively, a player can also acquire it as a drop from the Tortured Prisoner boss fight if they fail to give her the Swaddling Cloth before fighting The Sundered Monarch . She appears hostile towards the path leading to the bedroom in Bramis Castle .

item.title: Call of Duty Zombies Fan Pays Tribute to Iconic Maps with a Pair of Tattoos
item.description:
Highlights

  • A dedicated Call of Duty Zombies fan has permanently inked iconic map symbols on their arm, paying tribute to Mob of the Dead and Shadows of Evil.
  • Specifically, the tattoos depict the Afterlife symbol from Mob and the Beast mark from Shadows.
  • The Black Ops series solidified the Zombies mode as a fan favorite with deep storylines and entertaining characters, and it will be interesting to see where Black Ops 6 takes it next.

A dedicated player permanently marked their body with symbols that will instantly be recognizable to fans of Call of Duty Zombies . These markings act as a nostalgic callback to two of Call of Duty Zombies ' most iconic maps, like Shadows of Evil and Mob of the Dead.

Call of Duty continues to dominate the multiplayer FPS genre, with Modern Warfare 3 delivering consistent updates and exciting new pieces of content for players to sink their teeth into. Modern Warfare 3 recently rolled out its season 4 content update, bringing with it a plethora of new guns, modes, maps, and other features to discover. Alongside hectic FPS action, Modern Warfare 3 also acts as the next evolution of the long-running Zombies mode that players first fell in love with in Call of Duty: World at War . Despite some of them being over a decade old, players continue to return to Call of Duty Zombies ' most popular maps, with one fan showing off their dedication in a unique and permanent way.

A post from Reddit user MassiveBeans garnered quite a lot of attention within the Call of Duty Zombies community, with the player revealing they had gotten not one, but two tattoos referencing the game mode. A blacked-out version of the "Beast" marking can be seen on the top of their hand, which is a reference to a gameplay feature found within the Black Ops 3 map Shadows of Evil.

Call of Duty Fan Shows Off Zombies Tattoos

The references to Call of Duty Zombies don't stop there, with the fan also getting inked on the inside of their forearm. Fans of the Black Ops 2 map Mob of the Dead will recognize this image as the Afterlife symbol, which was also a gameplay feature on the map. These two maps share a lot in common, both visually and thematically, placing players within some demented versions of purgatory. There are still plenty of zombies to slay, but Shadows of Evil and Mob of the Dead feature some of the series' most intriguing and hellish storylines.

While World at War introduced the world to Call of Duty Zombies , the original Black Ops cemented the game mode as a new avenue of entertainment for players keen on shooting hordes of zombies. Continuing from Call of Duty: World at War , Black Ops debuted with a feature-rich Zombies mode, now complete with a deep storyline, more gameplay mechanics, and an incredibly entertaining cast of characters. With the next Call of Duty title officially confirmed to be Black Ops 6 , many fans are looking forward to seeing what developer Treyarch will do next with its iconic, round-based game mode.

item.title: Fallout: All Player Character Origins, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fallout protagonists are uniquely customizable, reflecting players' choices in gender, stats, and appearance for an immersive gameplay experience.
  • Origin stories vary in significance, shaping decisions and interactions within the game world and adding depth to character development.
  • Each protagonist's background contributes to the overall narrative, connecting past events to current challenges in a post-apocalyptic setting.

Fallout is a diverse franchise with entries ranging in multiple decades and genres. Although certain aspects of their stories form a common thread, each game features the option to create a character unique to the player, including their gender, stats, and appearance. Additionally, most of these characters hail from one of the many underground Vaults built across the United States by Vault-Tec to survive a post-war world, but with Vault-Tec's sinister experiments at the helm, not all is what it seems for the protagonist's arrival.

The origin stories for each Fallout protagonist vary in importance, with some characters having elaborate and important backstories that cause certain choices from previous entries to be considered a part of the franchise's official canon. Other times, the backstories are not as important as the current events, and so only serve to flesh out the world in smaller ways.

7 Vault 76's Vault Dwellers

Pre-War Citizens Hand-Selected To Enter Vault 76, And To Leave 25 Years After The Great War

Vault 76 was one of a small number of designated control Vaults, where experiments would not take place. Instead, the residents were carefully selected by Vault-Tec to live inside for 25 years, before going out into the remnants of West Virginia and reclaiming the world for their corporate saviors. Some citizens were graduates of the nearby Vault-Tec University, while others were experienced lawyers and military veterans.

The specific backstory of the player characters does not impact the story and is therefore up to the player if they want to create one in their own minds. However, the unique nature of having an entire Vault emptied to the surface at the same time gave Fallout 76 the ability to make all of its players feel like part of the actual story since the game was designed to be multiplayer, making it so that their co-op companions, and enemies, were all former neighbors from within Vault 76.

6 The Vault Dweller

Vault 13's Isolation Ends When A Dweller Is Sent Out To Find A Replacement Water Chip

Until December 2161, the Vault Dweller lived a typical life within the confines of Vault 13. That was when they drew the short straw and were tasked with leaving the Vault to find a replacement for the water purification chip. Since the character and player were both new to a post-war life on the surface in the world of Fallout , the relatively blank slate that the Vault Dweller started with serves as a great way to introduce all the elements of the universe.

By starting as a character who does not know what's going on, the player ends up learning and growing alongside the Vault Dweller, which makes the story more immersive and compelling. The Vault Dweller's origin also set the stage for future games in the series, since Vault-Tec has nearly always been front and center in the franchise.

5

4 The Courier

An Employee Of The Mojave Express, Shot Twice In The Head, Waking Up With A Vengeance

In 2281, Mr. House hired six different couriers from the Mojave Express to deliver the Platinum Chip (and 5 decoy packages) to New Vegas, which he could use to unleash an army of upgraded Securitrons and take over the Mojave Wasteland. Courier Six, Fallout: New Vegas' protagonist, Courier Six, was intercepted by a gangster named Benny along with some Great Khans and shot in the head. Surprisingly, the Courier survived this encounter and began seeking revenge once they had recovered.

Prior to these events, the Courier traveled across the wasteland, and players can select various options during conversations with NPCs that solidify some of these journeys into their particular canon. For instance, the player can mention their character's familiarity with the Brotherhood of Steel or go in the opposite direction and tell their companion Cass that they don't know what a fish is. While much of the backstory is left to the player to decide, the Courier's unique job traveling the surface informs the way that the game plays out.

3 The Sole Survivor

A Pre-War Veteran and Lawyer, Cryogenically Frozen In Vault 111

  • Fallout 4

Like other player characters in the series, Fallout 4 's Sole Survivor can be male or female. However, this character's story is slightly different based on that choice. The male character, Nate, is a veteran of war for America, whilst his wife, Nora, is a lawyer. The couple loved their lives in 2077's Boston with their newborn son, Shaun, but then, the bombs began to fall. Nate and Nora take Shaun and head for Vault 111, a mysterious Vault designed to protect them as the world they know is atomized. When starting as either of these characters, the established backstory of a lawyer or a veteran aids in their immersion and roleplay due to thinking how these characters would.

The fact that the Sole Survivor is a pre-war human, and not a ghoul, is extremely fascinating. Yet, the journey doesn't begin until the player character and the Vault residents are cryogenically frozen, only for the player to wake up early, witnessing the murder of their partner and the kidnapping of their infant son, with everyone else frozen to death, over 200 years into the future in an unrecognizable world.

2 The Lone Wanderer

A Resident Of Vault 101 Who Escapes To Find Their Dad In The Capitol Wasteland

Fallout 3 's protagonist, the Lone Wanderer, was led to believe that they were born in Vault 101. In reality, they were born on the surface whilst their parents were working on Project Purity. Unfortunately, the Lone Wanderer's mother died shortly after giving birth, and so their father moved into Vault 101 with his newborn baby.

Players don't learn any of this until later on in the story, which makes for an interesting reveal. Instead, the beginning of the game is full of snapshots of childhood within Vault 101, including a birthday party in which they received their PipBoy. Witnessing the Lone Wanderer's childhood adds a great deal of depth to the character, and even more tension when it comes to escaping the Vault to find their father on the surface.

1 The Chosen One

A Descendant Of The Vault Dweller From Vault 13, Set Out As A Champion To Find The Garden Of Eden Creation Kit

At the end of the original Fallout, the Vault Dweller was canonically exiled from Vault 13. They left and founded a village called Arroyo out in the wasteland. Another Vault Dweller named Pat eventually followed him and the two were married and had children together. Fallout 2 's protagonist, The Chosen One, was the Vault Dweller's grandchild. They were selected by the village elder to find a G.E.C.K (Garden of Eden Creation Kit) which could terraform the area and save the dying village.

Alongside New Vegas' Courier, the Chosen One is the only main entry protagonist who was born and raised on the surface. Their story also serves as an indirect continuation of the Vault Dweller from the original game, and that connection helps the story to be as much about the broader world of Fallout.
